1145560.name: Marble Trap
1145560.description:
Dive into the thrilling world of Marble Trap, an exciting isometric rolling race game that challenges your agility and speed. Navigate through a series of increasingly treacherous tracks filled with cleverly placed traps, as you race to the finish line without falling into the sea!

Features:

  • Fast-Paced Racing: Experience the adrenaline rush as you roll your marble through 144 challenging levels. Each level is meticulously designed to test your reflexes and quick thinking, with minor obstacles at the start that escalate into complex trap-filled tracks!

  • Varied Traps: Prepare to face a barrage of traps, including rotating axes, spike cubes, rising spears, trap pits, and shooting cannons. The challenge increases as you progress, and slow players might find themselves chased by relentless chainsaws!

  • Inspired by Retro Classics: Marble Trap draws inspiration from beloved platformers like Marble Madness, Marble Blast, and Super Monkey Ball. With easy-to-learn controls using only the directional buttons, you'll quickly find yourself immersed in this nostalgic experience.

  • Compete with Friends: Set your best times and climb the leaderboards! Challenge your friends or take on players worldwide in daily and weekly challenges that keep the excitement alive.

  • Perfect for Speedrunners: With a focus on speed and precision, Marble Trap offers endless replayability for speedrunners and casual players alike. Collect stars on each course for added achievements and bragging rights!

Why You'll Love Marble Trap: Engaging gameplay, responsive controls, and a visually appealing design make Marble Trap a delightful escape for gamers seeking a fast-paced challenge. With an energetic soundtrack to keep you motivated, you’ll find yourself coming back for more.

Join the fun, conquer the traps, and prove you have what it takes to master the marble rolling challenge!

Are you ready to roll? Get Marble Trap today and race to the finish!
1145560.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 瑞典语, 泰语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 越南语
